Name: Fair & Warmer Cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Sure to warm and fairly good.
History: Adapted from Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Fair & Warmer Cocktail contains 145 calories
